channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Smart Switch PC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Smart Switch PC

item.title: CVE-2022-27842|2024-08-03T05:41:10.050Z -- samsung%20mobile -- smart%20switch%20pc
item.description: DLL hijacking vulnerability in Smart Switch PC prior to version 4.2.22022_4 allows attacker to execute abitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2022-39846|2024-08-03T12:07:43.014Z -- samsung%20mobile -- smart%20switch%20pc
item.description: DLL hijacking vulnerability in Smart Switch PC prior to version 4.3.22083_3 allows attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2022-39844|2024-08-03T12:07:42.878Z -- samsung%20mobile -- smart%20switch%20pc
item.description: Improper validation of integrity check vulnerability in Smart Switch PC prior to version 4.3.22083 allows local attackers to delete arbitrary directory using directory junction.
